DOC.brief_summary: To establish whether LJM716 combination cetuximab safe beneficial effect patient platinum-pretreated recurrent/metastatic head neck squamous cell carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety LJM716 Cetuximab Head Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Most recent regimen contain platinum cetuximab ( Phase II , group B ) . ECOG Performance Status ( PS ) ≤ 2 . Recovery AEs previous anticancer therapy , baseline CTCAE Grade ≤ 1 , except alopecia . Measurable disease determine RECIST v1.1 . Previous antiHER3 antibody treatment . Symptomatic brain metastasis . Prior systemic anticancer treatment , within period time short cycle length use treatment prior start study treatment . Prior anaphylactic severe infusion reaction human immunoglobulin antibody formulation . Inadequate end organ function . Ongoing diarrhea CTCAE Grade ≥ 2 . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
